pressOnNails.description: High-quality reusable press-on nails with various designs. Perfect for quick glam without salon visits.

items.name: Gel Extensions
items.description: Semi-permanent gel-based nail extensions for a natural look.
items.notes: Includes shaping, buffing, and gel application.

items.name: Acrylic Nails
items.description: Durable acrylic nail enhancements with strong structure.
items.notes: Ideal for long-lasting wear. Includes nail art on request.

items.name: Gel-X Nails
items.description: Soft gel extensions that are lightweight and flexible.
items.notes: Gentle on natural nails. Gaining popularity in metro cities.

items.name: Custom Nail Art
items.description: Hand-painted or designed nail art on press-ons.
items.notes: Popular for weddings and festivals. Prices vary with complexity.

additionalInfo.bookingNote: Advance booking recommended during festive seasons.
